attributes.action: Introduce legislation to limit property ownership, property costs and rent.
attributes.additional_details:
Setting a limit of 1 property would free up all current properties owned by landlords forcing down property costs.

Setting a low maximum property size would free up millions of acres currently in the hands of a small percentage of the population, this would also decrease property prices.

Link property prices and rental to minimum wage to prevent future increases.
attributes.background: This will address the high cost of property ownership and the associated high cost of rent

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might also like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/255287
